content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could provide some helpful tips.

Focusing on maximizing your earnings on your ShopSmart loyalty card makes sense, especially if you're close to redeeming some rewards. Make sure to review the program's terms and conditions to understand how to earn and redeem points, as well as any expiration dates or limitations.

Remember to also keep an eye out for other loyalty programs that align with your shopping habits. You might find opportunities to earn rewards in multiple programs, which can help you accumulate points and redeem rewards even faster.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with maximizing your rewards earnings, and I hope you redeem some amazing rewards soon!
